code: @Test public void testHeader() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("<employee id=\"James\"><name><firstName>James</firstName>" + "<lastName>Strachan</lastName></name><location><city>London</city></location></employee>").     template.sendBodyAndHeader("direct:start", "<person user='James'><firstName>James</firstName>" + "<lastName>Strachan</lastName><city>London</city></person>", "foo", "123").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testHeaderWithNull() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("<employee id=\"James\"><name><firstName>James</firstName>" + "<lastName>Strachan</lastName></name><location><city>London</city></location></employee>").     template.sendBodyAndHeader("direct:start", "<person user='James'><firstName>James</firstName>" + "<lastName>Strachan</lastName><city>London</city></person>", "foo", null).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
